patterns: Who is the guy who made you

responses: You can call me IBOT for short
I am IRISIBOT, my friends call me IBOT
I can tell you about IRISI
I can give you interesting informations about IRISI

patterns: What can you tell me about IRISI
What do you know about IRISI
What can you tell me about IRISI
What do you know about IRISI
responses: IRISI: Engineering in Networks and Information Systems (in French it's Ingenierie en Reseaux Informatique et Systemes d'Information). In the vast field of Computer Science, this sector is mainly interested in aspects : Information systems & Computer Networks.

patterns: Give me some information about IRISI
Give me some infos about Engineering in Networks and Information Systems
Engineering in Networks and Information Systems interesting infos
responses: The IT engineer specializing in information systems and networks is an actor essential to the business. He is trained to intervene at all levels of the network and the system company information. He brings his skills in the areas of administration data centers and databases, network administration, definition architecture of information systems, the development of applications intended to improve the effectiveness of the business, project management and development team on the systems of information. Its relations with the other departments of the company are essential. The engineer must, in a pragmatic way, be able to formalize the needs with the users and to set up a project methodology with its collaborators.

patterns: What can you tell me about modules
What do you know about modules
What can you tell me about modules
responses: There ara 40 modules, 8 modules for each semester (1,2,3,4, and 5) and PFE for semester 6.

patterns: What can you tell me about Semester 1
What do you know about Semester 1
What can you tell me about Semester 1
responses:
There ara 8 modules for semester 1;
Module 1: Microprocesseur et programmation assembleur,
Module 2: Linux/Unix,
Module 3: Programmations Orientées Objet Java,
Module 4: Les réseaux,
Module 5: Concepts des Bases de Données,
Module 6: Programmation Evénementielle .NET,
Module 7: Entreprenariat et économie de l'entreprise (3ee),
Module 8: Langues et communication 1.

patterns: What can you tell me about Semester 2
What do you know about Semester 2
What can you tell me about Semester 2
responses:
There ara 8 modules for semester 2;
Module 9: Architectures Clients/Serveur,
Module 10: Méthodologie d'analyse,
Module 11: TCP/IP et interconnexion des réseaux,
Module 12: Bases de Données Relationnelles,
Module 13: Statistique et théorie des graphes,
Module 14: Programmations Orientées Objet Java - IHM,
Module 15: Techniques de gestion de l'entreprise,
Module 16: Langues et communication 2.

patterns: What can you tell me about Semester 3
What do you know about Semester 3
What can you tell me about Semester 3
responses:
There ara 8 modules for semester 3;
Module 17: Conception des Systèmes d'Information,
Module 18: Systèmes d'Exploitation,
Module 19: Conception Objet UML,
Module 20: Réseaux Mobiles,
Module 21: Administration de Bases de Données,
Module 22: Programmation Mobile,
Module 23: Fonctions clés de l'Entreprise,
Module 24: Langues et communication 3.

patterns: What can you tell me about Semester 4
What do you know about Semester 4
What can you tell me about Semester 4
responses:
There ara 8 modules for semester 4;
Module 25: Conduite de Projet Informatique,
Module 26: L'Intelligence Artificielle,
Module 27: Programmation Concurrentielle et Réseau,
Module 28: Bases de Données Reparties,
Module 29: Méthodes Agiles,
Module 30: Analyse de Données,
Module 31: Management de projet et gestion des services publics,

patterns: What can you tell me about Semester 5
What do you know about Semester 5
What can you tell me about Semester 5
responses:
There ara 8 modules for semester 5;

Module 33: Administration des réseaux, Sécurité des réseaux,
Module 34: Bases de Données Semi- Structurées,
Module 35: Entrepôt de Données,
Module 36: Management des Systèmes d'Information,
Module 37: Systèmes Répartis,
Module 38: Urbanisation et Gouvernance des Systèmes d'Information,

responses: For semester 6, the student will do an end-of-study intership at a company during the semester.
